column1: Unfortunately COVID-19 is on the rise. We all need to do our part to fight this disease. Wear a mask 😷 Social distance 📏 Wash your hands 🧼 https://t.co/AuoruBDKy8
Do everything you can -- wear a mask wash your hands social distance -- to prevent the spread of covid-19.  https://t.co/IyDuTpRwhc

I spoke on the House Floor in support of the 21st Century Community Learning Centers COVID Relief Act. After school programming provides one of the most effective ways to keep children safe in the late afternoon & keeps them on the right path towards completing school. https://t.co/CelueNSDTs
They discussed the #BigTechHearing and Coronavirus relief. Check it out. https://t.co/mh86TSFqGr

Pls RT. Suggestions from the CDC on preventing the spread of coronavirus:   ➡️Avoid close contact w/people who are sick ➡️Avoid touching your eyes nose & mouth ➡️Stay home when you are sick ➡️Cover your cough or sneeze w/ a tissue then throw tissue in the trash
